text:
This 42% matches pretty closely with the numbers in a recent German poll where ~55% think #AstraZeneca vaccine is unsafe (link⬇️).

There needs to be a really strong push for the #AstraZeneca vaccine specifically.

#COVID19 #vaccine #cdnpoli
